channel.title: I know this is very dumb
channel.description:
But can someone tell me how this will work?.. ## Crafting ##
Required:
1 Hide - Vambs..
2 Hide - Chaps
3 Hide - Body..
Now how will that work ItemOnItem wise?..
How will they choose what they wanna make?..
There is no interface for Black D'hide Crafting..
